bill_title: to revise requirements concerning deadline for registration cards.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise requirements concerning deadline for registration cards. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 12-4 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Notwithstanding § 12-4-5, a registration card which is completed by the registration deadline, but is not received by the county auditor by the statutory deadline, shall be accepted by the county auditor upon order from a circuit court if the court finds that the card was completed by the deadline but not received by the statutory deadline through no fault of the person registering to vote. No action under this section may be commenced five days or less before an election. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
